category: Product > materials, treatments and surfaces (including paneling)
description_html: Designers can achieve the look they're going for on any surface with Elements Gravitas' variety of colors, textures, and patterns in ways they didn't think was possible to install. The new collection is innovative, light-weight materials that come from the automotive industry and which, in combination with MI decorative surfaces, can be used as wall panelling. Elements is extremely light and compact, which means that it can be cut and further processed using standard tools. Moreover, processing is even joint-free. Elements can be bonded edge to edge and therefore does not require expansion joints. As a result, revolutionary design options can be implemented on large surface areas. Irrespective of whether leather, wood or stone patterning is involved, the Elements products are extremely light, but nonetheless dimensionally stable. These products are easy to handle and offer flexible applications. Professional processing of the material is straight forward and takes place on the patterned side. Readjustment on any surface is no problem when bonding with silicon is employed. Elements Gravitas takes the beauty and design of the old collection but is an improvement on the manufacturing, processing, and installation. All in all, the new collection is a reissue based on the advancement of technology.
